consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+75 ability power
+350 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Dark Pact: Gain ability power equal to 2% bonus health.
Unique – Azakana Gaze: Dealing ability damage curses enemies, causing them to take「 ( 6.4% / 4%) of their maximum health as total magic damage over 4 seconds. 」「 ( 1.6% / 1%) of their maximum health as magic damage every second over 4 seconds. 」
passive.originText: UNIQUE – DARK PACT: Gain ability power equal to 2% bonus health.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  815

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • helmet

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+30 armor
+30 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Voidborn Resilience: For each second in combat with champions, gain 2 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of 16 bonus resistances. At maximum stacks, instantly deal 80 (+ 7% bonus health) magic damage to enemy champions within 700 units, heal for the same amount for each target damaged, and increase your bonus resistances by 20% until the end of combat.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 armor and 5 magic resistance.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – VOIDBORN RESILIENCE: For each second in combat with champions, gain 2 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of 16 bonus resistances. At maximum stacks, instantly deal 80 (+ 7% bonus health) magic damage to enemy champions within 700 units,  heal for the same amount for each target damaged, and increase your bonus resistances by 20% until the end of combat.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  800

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+500 health
+50 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 25% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 25% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+10 ability haste
+500 health
+300 mana
+40 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Eternity: Restore mana equal to 7% of pre-mitigation damage taken from champions, and heal for an amount equal to 25% of mana spent, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second.
Unique – Unmake: Enemy champions within 550 units of you become cursed, reducing their magic resistance by 5 (+ 1.2% bonus health), capped at a reduction of 25. Gain 9 bonus magic resistance per cursed enemy.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ETERNITY: Restore mana equal to 7% of pre-mitigation damage taken from champions, and  heal for an amount equal to 25% of mana spent, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second.

1.originHTML: +  +  650

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 mana
+90 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rock Solid: Every first incoming instance of post-mitigation basic damage per cast instance is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.
Unique – Winter's Caress: Cripples the attack speed of enemies within 700 units by 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ROCK SOLID: Every first incoming instance of post-mitigation  basic damage per cast instance is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.
